titleStmt.title: His Maiesties royall protestations to all His loving subiects declaring his resolution for the maintenance of true religion, the lawes, and liberty of the subject, with the just priviledges of Parliament : and His Majesties oath taken at his coronation.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

notesStmt.note: Extracts from the King's public pronouncements.
